# This file is autogenerated
title: createServerSigner
description: Overview of the createServerSigner method
slug: wallets/reference/account-kit/signer/functions/createServerSigner
---

Creates a new server signer.

## Import

```ts
import { createServerSigner } from "@account-kit/signer";
```

## Usage

```ts
const signer = await createServerSigner({
  auth: { accessKey },
  connection: {
    apiKey: "alchemy-api-key",
  },
});

console.log("Signer address:", await signer.getAddress());
```

## Parameters

### params

`CreateServerSignerParams`
Parameters

### params.auth

`AccessKeyAuthParams`
Authentication config for the server signer

### params.connection

`ConnectionConfig`
Connection config for the server signer

## Returns

`Promise<AlchemyServerSigner>`
A promise that resolves to a server signer
